name: deadly-asteroids
description: An entry for the 2021 edition of js13k

scripts.build: rm -rf ./space-sweeper && mkdir ./space-sweeper && cp ./src/*.png ./space-sweeper && cp ./src/*.woff2 ./space-sweeper && cp ./src/*.html ./space-sweeper && cp ./src/*.css ./space-sweeper && node build.js && zip -r space-sweeper.zip ./space-sweeper
